Name: Lucky Charm
Application: Once per battle, increase any Check by [1]5.

Name: Tooth Necklace
Application: Increase each of your Evasion scores by [2].

Name: Pearl Necklace
Application: Three times per battle, you may increase your Luck check by [3].

Name: Ring of Anima
Application: Once per battle you may temporarily resurrect a Dead-status combatant as an allie with [25]% of their Max Health restored.

Name: Pincer Dagger
Application: Your Unarmed attacks now have Bleeding [1]{SklPwr}

Name: Night Cloak
Application: [1] time(s) per battle, you may teleport to any location on the battlefield, except in cases of 150%+ Visibility

Name: Puppet Thrall
Application: Create a Level {TL} Puppet-class monster allie whose Vital scores are equal to [25]% of yours. It obeys your every command.
Ingredients: 5x Leather Strips, 1x Soul Gem, 3x Soul Fragments

Name: Deployable Ice Wall
Application: Once per battle, place an Ice Wall prop into a space. At the start of your next turn, the targeted space is frozen over; combatants cannot enter but can climb atop, and combatants stuck inside are frozen until the ice is destroyed. The Ice is Water element and has [45]{TL} health.

Name: Exo-Skeleton of Power
Application: [1] times per battle (max once per turn), move any number of enemy combatants in a shared space into an adjacent space; no checks are made.

Name: War Horn
Application: Increase the Initiative Checks of yourself and your allies by [5].

Name: Torch
Application: Passive. Increase the Visibility in your space for yourself and your allies by [50]%; cannot exceed 100%.

Name: Frag Grenade
Application: Once per battle, place a Grenade prop into any space equal-to-or-within 2sp of yourself. At the start of your next turn, the Grenade prop explodes, inflicting [15]{TL} neutral damage.

Name: Cursed Token
Application: Enemy combatants in your space get -[5] to their Luck Checks.

Name: Vision Lens
Application: Use once per battle. Gain Advantage on your next [3] checks.

Name: Dream Crystal
Application: Once per battle, choose one of your Abilities to target and improve where available. Target Ability's Rank is increased by [2], its Range is increased by [2], its AP cost is reduced by [5], and its Stamina/Mana/Focus costs are reduced by [50]%.

Name: Power Cell
Application: Once per battle, target an effect that says "Once per battle" (except this) and change it to "[3] times per battle".

Name: Magnifier Lens
Application: At the beginning of battle, increase the Range attribute of a Weapon or Ability by [1]sp.

Name: Scale Armor
Application: At the beginning of battle you gain [5] Armor Points. Spend X Armor Points to reduce the Rank of incoming damage by X (min 0).

Name: Spine Whip
Application: Once per battle you may choose a combatant within [2]sp and move them into your space.

Name: Carnal Flute
Application: [3] times per battle, you may grant yourself or an allie an additional 5AP for the start of their next turn.

Name: Bone Shiv
Application: Up to three times per battle, make a Luck 10 check against a combatant in your space. Upon success, they take stackable Bleeding [5]{TL}

Name: Thorax Shield
Application: Once per turn and up to five times per battle, you may increase your Cover checks by [3].
